fees.description: $26.08 (inc. GST) Special Meter Read fee. This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary.
$71.64 (inc. GST) fee may apply when your property is disconnected. This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary.
$91.71 (inc. GST) fee may apply when your property is reconnected. This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary.
$2.75 (inc. GST) Direct Credit or Debit dishonour payment fee
A 0.73% (inc. GST) fee may apply to payments made by debit and credit cards.

gasContract.terms: See our full terms and conditions to www.covau.com.au for details.

discounts.description: Discounts applied to GST inclusive gas usage charges.

gasContract.variation: We may vary the charges of this plan (including their amount, nature and structure) at any time by giving you a notice at least 5 business days prior to the effective date of variation.All prices listed are inclusive of GST except where indicated.
gasContract.onExpiryDescription: This agreement continues until you or we end it.
gasContract.additionalFeeInformation: For information on additional fees, please visit our website : www.covau.com.au
